turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about LG Optimus 7.
turn.2: LG Optimus 7 The LG Optimus 7 (also known as the LG-E900) is a slate smartphone which runs Microsoft's Windows Phone operating system.
turn.4: The Optimus 7 is part of the first generation Windows Phone lineup launched October 2010.
turn.5: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.6: Several users reported an error while updating their handsets to Windows Phone 7.5 via Zune which only seemed to affect users with firmware versions 1.0.1.12 and 1.1.2.10. Newer versions of the firmware do not seem to have this problem.
turn.7: Did anyone find a solution to the problem?
turn.8: Certain users have reported the error has been removed after re-flashing their device ROM via an Authorised LG Support Center or restoring the previous version of their device and updating to Mango again.
turn.9: Did the phone have any other issues?
turn.10: The Optimus 7 has a tendency to heat to a high temperature, while the handset is left to run an application for an extended period of time.
turn.12: This behavior has also been noted during charging.
